title: Statement from the Press Secretary on the Visit of President Recep Tayyip Erdogan of Turkey â€“ The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
May 10, 2017
President Donald J. Trump will welcome President Recep Tayyip Erdogan of Turkey to the White House on May 16, where the two leaders will discuss how to further strengthen our bilateral relationship and deepen our cooperation to confront terrorism in all its forms.
